item.description:
This is a Astronomy event posted by the Buffumvile dam facility, this is not an Oxford astronomy Group event. I noticed a few days ago on the facility's bulletin that July 5th is a casual full moon observing night at Buffumville.
I thought it would be a good idea to post this event for our members. This could be a fun casual evening for everyone interested.
I will be there with my telescope.


To get to Buffumville Lake....

From Interstate 395, take Exit 4B Oxford center. Continue straight for 3 miles to Buffumville Park. The Buffumville Lake office is on Old Oxford Road (Buffums Dam Road) 2 1/2 mile from the Interstate. From the Massachusetts Turnpike, take the Sturbridge exit and follow Route 20 to Charlton. Take a right onto Route 31 and follow the signs to Buffumville Lake.
item.how_to_find_us: Large Astronomy Sign pointing to area
item.name: Astronomy event posted by the Buffumvile dam facility
